name: Potrace.js
tagline: Transforming bitmaps into vector graphics: a port of Peter Selinger's potrace in javascript
body:
### potrace.js
Create amazing graphics or artwork from bitmap images. Scale up small images for print. Apply new colors to images. Get creative!

### Description
Potrace is a tool for tracing a bitmap, which means, transforming a bitmap into a smooth, scalable image. The resulting image is not "jaggy" like a bitmap, but smooth. It can then be rendered or printed at any resolution. 

### Authors and Contributors
* potrace.js: defghi1977 http://defghi1977-onblog.blogspot.jp/2012/06/svg_28.html, http://www.libspark.org/svn/as3/PotrAs/src/com/nitoyon/potras/ , http://d.hatena.ne.jp/project_the_tower2/20110724/1311473645
* potrace: peter selinger http://potrace.sourceforge.net/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
